name: Dad's Garden Garlic Chilli Sauce
description: A delicious tomato based sauce blended with garlic and chillies. It can be a versatile dipping sauce or a flavourful homemade marinade. Add to your curries and stews for a unique flavour boost or spice up your Nasi goreng. Proudly manufactured and packed in Sri Lanka. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
